pages.title: Totems 101
pages.text: All totems start the same way: as a blank totem. Blank totems will sometimes drop off of evokers, they can be found in chests, or they can be crafted.$(br) There are two types of totems; active totems and passive totems. Active totems need to be 'activated', like being right clicked. Passive totems just work when they're in   your inventory.
$(br2)Once you have a blank totem, you will need to turn it into a either an active totem or a passive totem. (See chapter 2 & 3).
